p:
The total acidity of the honey was expressed in milli equivalents or mill moles of acid per kg of honey sample, which was equivalent to ml of 0.1M NaOH x 10 Eq. (1). Then, the value was expressed to the nearest one decimal point according to the standard procedure the Harmonized Methods of International Honey Commission ( Bogdanov, 2009).
(1)
A c i d i t y = 10 V
where; V = the volume of 0.1 N in a 10 g of honey sample.
